item.title: IA in Belgium, Australia, and Mexico!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
It seems that the IA tour is back in full swing and starting soon! During the live stream on January 27th, they announced a show in Mexico and one in Melbourne, Australia. We also have another date to add to that list, Belgium! Belgium Bonjour la Belgique!Bonjour Bruxelles!Est-ce que vous avez des plans pour le …

The post IA in Belgium, Australia, and Mexico! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It seems that the IA tour is back in full swing and starting soon! During the live stream on January 27th, they announced a show in Mexico and one in Melbourne, Australia. We also have another date to add to that list, Belgium!

Belgium

Bonjour la Belgique!Bonjour Bruxelles!Est-ce que vous avez des plans pour le prochain fin de semaine?Nous on sera au…

Posted by IA　World Page on Thursday, February 23, 2017

Concert Screening

Location: Brussels at MADE IN ASIA
Address: Place de Belgique 1, 1020 Brussels, Palace #5
Date & Time:
1. Friday, March 3rd (19:30)
2. Saturday, March 4th (11:15)
3. Sunday, March 5th (17:15)
Tickets: Click here

Other Activities

There will also be other things happening at their booth! These include:

  • Exclusive sales of the “IA PARTY A GO-GO” DVD
  • Exclusive sales of the IA plushie
  • Photo corner with the IA plushie as well as a contest (details to be announced)
  • VOCALOID workshop for people who wish to learn more about using the software IA ROCKS (subscriptions on location)
  • Reading corner for Jin‘s new manga NIRVANA
  • Lottery for a chance to win 1 of 2 signed manga by Jin
  • Gaming corner with PSP
  • Gifts for cosplayers
  • And many more surprises!

Australia

Hello Australia!Hello Melbourne!Sorry for keeping you wait!Now we have all the info and we can officially confirm that…

Posted by IA　World Page on Thursday, February 23, 2017

Location: Melbourne at Asia Pop Fest
Address: Arts Centre Melbourne, 100 St Kilda Rd, Melbourne VIC 3004 (Sidney Myer Music Bowl)
Date & Time: Friday, March 24th (5 PM – 10 PM)
Tickets: Click here

Mexico

Hola México! IA estará en concierto el próximo 23 de Marzo en Fanaticon CDMX! …A estudiar español entonces!Los…

Posted by IA　World Page on Tuesday, February 21, 2017

Live Concert

Location: Mexico City at Centro Banamex
Address: Conscripto 311, Colonia Lomas de Sotelo, Delegación Miguel Hidalgo, 11200
Date & Time: Thursday, March 23rd
Tickets: Click here

Stay tuned to VNN for all future announcements on IA and 1st Place!

The post IA in Belgium, Australia, and Mexico! appeared first on VNN.
